title: Some Skype users off line
text: Some Skype users off line September 21 2015 at 03:23pm By Reuters Comment on this story AFP A Skype logo. Redmond - Skype, Microsoft’s online telephone and video service, said some users are unable to make calls on Monday because their settings show that they and their contacts are off line, even when they are logged in. In an updated blog post, Skype also said some messages to group chats are not being delivered and that users who are not already signed in may face difficulty while accessing their accounts. Skype added users could experience delays in seeing changes made to their accounts, such as credit balance and profile details. Users may also face difficulty loading web pages on the Skype Community, the company said in a blog post. In an earlier post, Skype had said its instant messaging and Skype for Web services were not facing technical issues. REUTERS Please read our comment guidelines .
